hypothesis_content.title: Fed Liquidity vs. Japan Divergence Regime Switch
hypothesis_content.statement: Simultaneous Fed liquidity expansion (QT end) and Bank of Japan tightening will create a 5-day window where crypto acts as 'neutral ground' between USD and JPY flows, resulting in reduced BTC correlation to both DXY and Nikkei 225 (<0.3 absolute correlation) while maintaining upward price trajectory.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Conflicting major central bank policies create cross-currents where traditional asset allocations become unclear. Crypto benefits as a 'third option' not directly tied to either currency bloc, attracting flows from both sides. Current neutral regime (61.5% confidence) is ideal for this divergence play.
entry_conditions: Fed QT end announced within 48 hours of BoJ rate shift
BTC price above 20-day SMA while correlations are low

exit_conditions.take_profit: Either correlation returns to >0.5 OR 8% price appreciation
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC price drops below 20-day SMA while in low-correlation state

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC shows strong correlation (>0.6) to either USD or JPY assets during the policy divergence period
